DOC.brief_summary: This study First Time Human Study ( FTIH ) aim assess safety tolerability GW805858 single repeat dose . The study also aim assess safety tolerability mild asthmatic subject well healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: The Safety Tolerability GW805858 Healthy Volunteers Mild Asthmatics
DOC.criteria: Men woman nonchild bear potential , age 18 60 year age inclusive . Body weight = 50 kg ( 110 lb ) men = 45 kg woman Body Mass Index ( BMI ) within range 19.030.0 kg/m2 inclusive . The subject current nonsmoker use tobacco product last year . A signed date write informed consent obtain subject . The subject able understand comply protocol requirement timetable , instruction protocolstated restriction . If asthmatic , subject must clinically stable asthmatic . The subject history allergy ingredient within inhaler . The subject receive investigational drug participate research trial within 30 day , prior first dose current study medication . The subject use prescription nonprescription drug , include vitamin , herbal dietary supplement ( include St John 's Wort ) within 14 day prior first dose study medication . The subject average weekly alcohol intake great 21 unit male 14 unit female . The subject history breathing problem ( e.g . history asthmatic symptom ) . The subject infect hepatitis B , hepatitis C , HIV virus . The subject respiratory tract infection worsen asthma within 4 week start study . The subject past present disease , judge Investigator , may affect outcome study . The subject history lifethreatening asthma , define asthma episode require intubation and/or associate hypercapnea , respiratory arrest hypoxia seizure . The subject take inhaled , nasal dermal steroid within 4 week oral steroid within 8 week start study . The subject unable abstain drug may interfere conduct study . The subject ongoing rhinitis require treatment .
